text: The following lists the top 25 albums of 2016 in Australia from the Australian Recording Industry Association (ARIA) end-of-year albums chart. Adele’s album 25 was the most popular album in 2016 in Australia, for the second year in a row. The album spent 45 weeks in the top 10. For the 6th year in a row, Michael Bublé's Christmas made the end of year top ten. In December 2016, the album surpassed one million copies in Australia, making it the 12th biggest selling album of all-time in Australia. Keith Urban's Ripcord was the highest selling album by an Australian artist in 2016. == Top 25 == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !scope="col"| # !scope="col"| Title !scope="col"| Artist
